Text: Industry Policy Task Force Meeting May Industry Policy Task Force KickOff Meeting Initiating ProActive Budget Advocacy Educational and Corporate Energy Management Actions Guest Speaker Theo Johnson Manager Best Practices Program US DOE Office of Industrial Technologies Task Force Scope Issues and Strategies and Mechanics Education of media and policymakers on the benefits of industrial energyefficiency policies Advocacy in support of restorationincrease in the Office of Industrial Technologies OIT budget Promotion of best corporate energy management practices by industry Thursday May am pm after Associates Breakfast nd Floor Conference Room DeweyBallantine Pennsylvania Avenue NW Washington DC nd block south from Farragut West th Street Exit Enter on th Street If you have not already been contacted please RSVP by May to Natasha Ewell at or mailto The Task Force will start promptly at am Lunch will be provided Conference call arrangements will also be available Phone Fax wwwaseorg Task Force Scopedoc Task Force Scopedoc
